featured.text: While one person enjoys playing seventy-two holes of golf a week, another would rather play three sweaty, competitive games of tennis.
In this way, these secret shoppers may help a business gain a competitive edge.

definition.zh_def: 具有競爭性的，能夠與他人競爭的。
definition.en_def: Having a strong desire to compete or succeed against others.
definition.example: She is very competitive and always strives to be the best in her class.
